name: PEPTO-DISMAL
description:
A short, three-room game about a bat in a very grim, bright-pink situation.

I was really aiming to create an atmosphere with this and I think I achieved my goal. I might turn this into a larger game someday if I still like the concept later.

Created with Bitsy.
Special thanks to the Bitsy Discord community. You're all so wonderful and supportive <3
